H0.text: when did the royal proclamation of 1763 end. 1774

H2.text: when did the royal proclamation of 1763 end. 1768

H3.text: when did the royal proclamation of 1763 end. 1783

A4.text: In the United States, the Royal Proclamation of 1763 ended with the American Revolutionary War because Great Britain ceded the land in question to the United States in the Treaty of Paris (1783).
